scripts.build: cat style.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass style.scss --output-style expanded > style.css --recursive-false
scripts.zip: zip -r nightingale-buddyboss.zip ./ -x .git .gitignore *.git/* /critical-css-generator.js /postcss.config.js *.github/* /Dockerfile /gruntfile.js /package.json package-lock.json *.DS_Store .DS_Store node_modules/ wp-html-mail/ wp-html-mail/* /phpcs.xml.dist node_modules/**\*
